price: Ní ọjọ́ tí Allāhu yóò kó gbogbo wọn jọ pátápátá, lẹ́yìn náà Ó máa sọ fún àwọn mọlāika pé: “Ṣé ẹ̀yin ni wọ́n ń jọ́sìn fún?”
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يَقُولُ لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ أَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِيَّاكُمۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yaḥshuruhum jamīʿan thumma yaqūlu lil'malāikati ahāulāi iyyākum kānū yaʿbudūna
